verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H1980>doesn't<s%> walk in the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> nor <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> nor <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H3887>scoffers;<s%>
but his <S%H2656>delight<s%> is in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8451>law.<s%> On his <S%H8451>law<s%> he <S%H1897>meditates<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night.<s%>

He will be like a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> by the <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that brings <S%H5414>forth<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> also does not <S%H5034>wither.<s%> Whatever he <S%H6213>does<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are not <S%H4671>so,<s%> but are like the chaff which the <S%H7307>wind<s%> drives <S%H5086>away.<s%>
Therefore the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%> in the <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> nor <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>
